tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had  normal delivery outside India. Since then I used to have pain if I stand for long time or if I do any physical activity even after few months of delivery. When I came to India, I visited Dr Deepa dureja. She listened to me very patiently, did my checkup and diagnosed the root cause correctly. She explained me everything in detail. She is an expert in her field and her treatment really helped me get rid of the pain whereas other doctors couldn‚Äôt help me.
I strongly recommend Dr. Deepa if you are looking for a good gynaecologist who can help you out not only during the pregnancy/delivery phase but also with post pregnancy issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently completed treatment for vaginismus with Dr. Deepa Dureja, and I am beyond grateful for the treatment I received under her guidance. After consulting multiple doctors and not able to understand the condition, I felt relieved when I could finally find someone who could understand my problem and gave a realistic diagnosis and treatment. She thoroughly explained the condition and the treatment plan, making sure I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way.
Not only that, she also created a safe and non-judgmental environment, which was crucial for addressing such a sensitive issue. Her approach was holistic, combining medical treatment with practical exercises. I felt listened to and respected throughout the process.
Thanks to her treatment , I have made significant progress and now feel confident and pain-free.
I highly recommend Dr. Deepa Dureja to anyone dealing with vaginismus.
reply_text: Vaginismus is a gynae problem which needs special treatment.i I have developed New treatment methods to treat it & i am happy that your problem of vaginismus got solved/treated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had an amazing experience, Dr. Deepa is very friendly, explains the situation in a very positive manner. Made me feel very comfortable!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I and my wife started consulting Dr Deepa 10 months back. I must say Dr Deepa is an optimal mix of thorough professionalism and motherly warmth. My wife's pregnancy has been a magical journey. Dr Deepa not only debunked many myths but also instilled confidence of normal delivery through counselling. I am thrilled and thankful to Dr Deepa for executing a flawless normal delivery and taking immaculate care of my wife. Dr Deepa's 30+ years of experience definitely came in handy to give me and my wife confidence of sailing through the 9 months of pregnancy.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Bleeding During Pregnancy,Pregnancy,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),Miscarriage,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: we went her through practo but after our first visit she told us to book appointment directly with her as she said practo charge her alot.we started our treatment in February as my wife was facing spotting and brownish discharge and we chose to visit her after seeing her story on YouTube where she helped someone with this kind of problem and we were very puzzled and money was not an issue we just wanted solution of our problem *** ******* ** ****** *** ******** she advised to abort and stop taking all the medication given by our previous doctor ***** ******** ********* ** ** *** she charged 3000 rupees extra inspite of the  money paid to her for her appointment which was 700 rs at that time and on practo it was showing 600 rs at the time.but we didn't argue as we were already stressed with our situation.she gave the medicines to abort without even writing any prescription for it and we went home.but after taking medicine instead of bleeding it actually stopped the bleeding which was already there in form of brownish discharge or mild spotting.and we kept doing our follow ups for past 4 months as we wanted to conceive again.but today our second pregnancy also ended like first one *** ***** *** ****** ********* ** ** ***** *** **** ** **** ** *** ***** *************** *** ******* **** ** **** ** ** **** **** **** **** ** ***** ********* *** ** ****** ***** This time also we just wanted solution.but this time we also took second opinion as it already progressed towards miscarriage and the doctor she prescribed the abortion pills in the appointment fees itself and this time only we get to know that how this doctor taken too much money from us without any solid reason.*** **** **** *** ******* **** *** **********she kept taking different amounts for appointment in every follow up *** ** **** ** ** *******I don't recommend this doctor to anyone.
reply_text: In february patient came with a finished pregnancy for which she was taking duphaston which is given for pregnancy to grow.As she had come with reports of falling beta hcg levels ,duphaston had to be stopped & nonviable pregnancy had to be flushed off either with medicines or suction.Medical method was offered which patient took & paid for.The process was successful ,no suction had to be done.Patient is intelligent & only cause of successful procedure ,revisited clinic when got pregnant next time.As hcg levels were good this time Progesterone support in form of duphaston started with advice for serial usgs & beta hcg levels,inspite of good pregnancy support due to defective embryo the pregnancy could not grow beyond few weeks.Doctors are not God.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A special thanks to my gynaecologist, Dr. Deepa Dureja for being so amazing throughout my pregnancy. Actually my brother recommend Dr. Deepa and then I have consulted Dr. Deepa mam for entire 9 months of my pregnancy, we finally blessed with a healthy baby. She was always available whether it‚Äôs in clinic, on call or WhatsApp for all my queries. Also she has a personal touch with her patients. She was always positive in her approach and helped me steer through my pregnancy in a most convenient manner. Despite of too many complications during entire pregnancy cycle, she was available to guide us with best possible solutions and help us to take correct decision on correct timing.
She treats all her patients like a family and gives all great advises with a big smile. I strongly recommended all to be moms to visit Dr. Deepa. Thank you So Much Doctor üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
reply_text:
I'm glad that you enjoyed your pregnancy journey with me and had a smooth delivery inspite of many hurdles & obstacles in our path. Thank you for your appreciation.
Best wishes ‚ò∫Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review: My entire pregnancy journey was with Dr. Deepa Dureja. It would not be incorrect to say that the journey itself was a roller coaster and yet Dr. Deepa made it as smooth as it could get. She would not just be easily accessible for all my endless (at times naive) queries but would also encourage me to be positive. Discussing with her about my fears and apprehensions have always been reassuring and emotionally calming. She had been extremely patient and have helped us unpack all medical jargons so that we too understand every bit of the process. In short, she had provided complete personalised guidance throughout my pregnancy and have lastly ensured a smooth delivery and post natal care. I would definitely recommend her to all expecting mothers and women planning their pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been blessed with a healthy baby girl :) We would like to thank Dr. Deepa Dureja for her support and guidance during my wife's pregnancy phase. She is a very compassionate doctor and cares about her patients. Delhi maternity clinics and hospitals are infamous for troubling patients with unecessary billings but Dr. Deepa always suggested what was necessary and explained why each test or investigation was being carried out. She was always just one call away irrespective of Sundays and public holidays. We are lucky that we have her so close to our place. It was an overwhelming experience and we recommend Dr. Deepa Dureja's pulse medical centre, GK2 to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Deepa is very professional and focuses on what the patient treatment needs 
 I was very scared abt all the process , but she handled with all love and care. Her Guidance and pin point support helped me to undergo all process with confidence & recover well. I would highly recommend Dr. Deepa Dureja To anyone out there. I am very happy and satisfied. Doesn't feel like being treated as a patient but as a family membr.
reply_text: I am happy that you had a positive experience at my centre

She always guided me to make your self busy and that really helps me and bcz of this I even don‚Äôt realise when time passed away. I travelled a lot in my pregnancy time this makes me so happy and that can only happen bcz of Doctor correct  guidance. I am blessed with a baby girl. I would like to recommend every mom to be to visit Dr. Deepa Dureja once.
